newsitem.title: USA: Crop Growers Corp stake held by investors.
newsitem.headline: Crop Growers Corp stake held by investors.

text.p: Wisconsin investors Michael Roth and Brian Stark said Thursday they hold a 9.88 percent stake in Crop Growers Corp, or 788,200 common shares.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the investors said they bought their stake on March 18 at a price of $9.81 per share.

Crop Growers, based in Great Falls, Montana, markets and services federal multi-peril crop insurance and crop hail insurance for third party insurance companies and its own insurance company subsidiaries.
